description:
Want to annoy the heck out of the people around you? Then SOUND BOMB is the perfect app. Drop a sound bomb at your next family reunion and watch Aunt Dorothy wet her pants (and then vomit)...

Did your party get out of control? SOUND BOMB is the perfect app to shut it down. Comes with 3 different intensity levels to get the level you need, and uses your phone's speaker to emit a shrieking high-pitch INTENSE sound that no one can bare. 

Need more volume? Plug it into some external speakers and watch mayhem really set in... 

Don't be fooled by imitators, this is the REAL deal!
